TypeTeamMember.biography: Monica is the Vice President of Global Revenue Operations at TripleLift, where she partners with leaders across the revenue organization to arm them with data to make strategic business decisions. Monica launched the Revenue Operations department at TripleLift in 2017 after recognizing a need for streamlined forecasting and pipeline management across the Global Sales team. Before running Revenue Operations, Monica was the Head of Sales Planning at TripleLift, and had previously led an Account Management team in the pharmaceutical advertising division of Everyday Health. Monica holds a Master’s degree from New York University and a Bachelor’s degree from Drew University.
